snippet: The electronics retailer Best Buy is laying off 600 staff members in its Geek Squad technical support division and 1,800 other store workers.
abstract: Electronics retailer Best Buy will lay off 600 staff members in its Geek Squad technical support division and 1,800 other store workers as it seeks to restructure operations and improve results.
lead_paragraph: The electronics retailer Best Buy is laying off 600 staff members in its Geek Squad technical support division and 1,800 other store workers.

headline.main: Best Buy Plans to Cut 1.4% of Its Work Force
headline.print_headline: Best Buy Plans To Cut 1.4%. of Its Work Force
